name: Acrylic Paint Set
description: A set of 12 acrylic paints, high quality, vibrant colors for professional and amateur artists.

name: Watercolor Brush Set
description: A set of 6 high-quality watercolor brushes, suitable for detailed and broad strokes.

name: Canvas Board Pack
description: A pack of 5 canvas boards, perfect for oil, acrylic, and watercolor painting.

name: Oil Painting Set
description: A complete oil painting set with 12 colors, brushes, and a palette.

name: Watercolor Paper Pad
description: A pad of 10 sheets of high-quality watercolor paper, ideal for detailed artwork.

name: Drawing Pencils Set
description: A set of 12 drawing pencils ranging from soft to hard for various shading techniques.

name: Easel Stand
description: A sturdy easel stand, perfect for painting in the studio or outdoors.

name: Charcoal Drawing Set
description: A charcoal set with different thicknesses, great for sketching and shading.

name: Oil Paintbrush Set
description: A set of 5 brushes for oil painting, high-quality bristles for fine detailing.

name: Palette Knife Set
description: A set of 4 palette knives, perfect for mixing paint and creating texture on canvas.
